abstract: Republican presidential candidate Herman Cain's lack of political experience can be seen in missteps as he confronts questions about his tax plan.
snippet: Herman Cain is a candidate being tested for the first time, and his lack of experience can be seen in missteps as he confronts questions about his tax plan.
lead_paragraph: Herman Cain is a candidate being tested for the first time, and his lack of experience can be seen in missteps as he confronts questions about his tax plan.

headline.main: On Taxes and Fences, Cain Stumbles a Bit
headline.print_headline: On Taxes and Fences, Cain Stumbles a Bit
headline.seo: On Taxes and Fences, Herman Cain Stumbles a Bit
